title: Revaluation
content:
When will 3rd Sem esa revaluation results come 
And is it legit

comments.body:
>When will 3rd Sem esa revaluation results come

Re-evaluation usually takes 2-3 weeks at the very least. 

>And is it legit

Re-evaluation does not guarantee an increase in grade. It might increase your marks but if it isn't enough to push your grade, there won't be any change.
